name: Monster Girl Dormitory
description:
[Introduction]

Demon Niang Xiaowo's Demon Niang are sealed by a mysterious force, players need to unlock the seal and save the lovely Demon Niu!

Game Features

The plot is presented in a new comic form.

Game Features

Click the role to enter the decryption interface.
Complete decryption with one connection.
Put the character into the magic array to watch the plot.
